verses.name: Numbers 25:1
verses.text: And Israel abode in Shittim, and the people began to commit whoredom with the daughters of Moab.

verses.name: Numbers 25:2
verses.text: And they called the people unto the sacrifices of their gods: and the people did eat, and bowed down to their gods.

verses.name: Numbers 25:3
verses.text: And Israel joined himself unto Baal–peor: and the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 25:4
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Take all the heads of the people, and hang them up before the Lord against the sun, that the fierce anger of the Lord may be turned away from Israel.
